casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

June 5, 2006.

[Cite as 06/05/2006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-2763.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-0919. Conley v. Smith.

Stark App. No. 2005CA00215, 2006-Ohio-1498. This cause is pending before this court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellee’s motion to dismiss and/or suggestion of bankruptcy stay,

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that this case is stayed pending further order of this court.

*1490IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the parties shall file a notice with this court upon the termination of the automatic stay under the Bankruptcy Code.
